document.full_text: arnold schwarzenegger has zeroed in on the film that will mark his return to the big screen: "cry macho," a drama about a down-on-his-luck horse trainer who is hired to kidnap a 9-year-old boy.
document.title: arnold schwarzenegger picks drama for comeback
lines_and_colors: arnold schwarzenegger has zeroed in on the film that will mark his return to the big screen: "cry macho," a drama about a down-on-his-luck horse trainer who is hired to kidnap a 9-year-old boy.
